Observers

The following table provides information on the members of the concurrent_set and concurrent_multiset template classes.
Member Description
allocator_type get_allocator() const

Returns: a copy of the allocator associated with *this.

key_compare key_comp() const

Returns: key comparison functor associated with *this.

value_compare value_comp() const

Returns: the same as key_comp().
